profile.title: Profile
profile.sendMessageOrFeedback: Send us a message or feedback
profile.deleteAccountAndData: Delete your account and all your data
profile.pleaseSignIn: Please sign in to access your profile and manage your plant care settings
profile.deletingAccountAndData: Deleting your account and all data...
profile.failedToSaveSettings: Failed to save settings, failed to update the database
profile.bugReportSubmittedSuccessfully: Bug report submitted successfully! Thank you for helping us improve Bloomer.
profile.failedToSubmitBugReport: Failed to submit bug report, try again later
profile.messageSentSuccessfully: Message sent successfully! Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you soon.
profile.failedToSendMessage: Failed to send message, try again later
profile.userDeletedSuccessfully: User deleted successfully! Thank you for using Bloomer. Please let us know your frustrations. We hope to see you again!
profile.failedToDeleteAccount: Failed to delete your account. Try again later, if the issue appears again, please contact us.

deleteAccountModal.title: Delete Account
deleteAccountModal.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccountModal.warningMessage: All your plant data, photos, user info and any other data stored about you will be deleted. This decision is irreversible.

contactModal.title: Contact Us
contactModal.description: Have a question, suggestion, or feedback? We'd love to hear from you! Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contactModal.messagePlaceholder: Tell us what's on your mind...
contactModal.fillAllFields: Please fill in both email and message fields.
contactModal.enterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
contactModal.failedToSend: Failed to send message. Please try again.

bugReportModal.title: Report a Bug
bugReportModal.description: Help us improve Bloomer by reporting any issues you encounter. Please provide as much detail as possible.
bugReportModal.stepsToReproducePlaceholder:
1. Go to...
2. Click on...
3. See error...
bugReportModal.deviceInfoPlaceholder: Device model, OS version, app version, etc.
bugReportModal.fillTitleAndDescription: Please fill in the title and description fields.
bugReportModal.failedToSubmit: Failed to submit bug report. Please try again.

identify.title: Identify Plant
identify.failedToTakePicture: Failed to take picture. Please try again.
identify.failedToCaptureImage: Failed to capture image after multiple attempts
identify.cameraNotReady: Camera is not ready. Please close and reopen the camera.
identify.failedToCaptureImageRetry: Failed to capture image. Please try again.
identify.failedToReplacePicture: Failed to replace picture. Please try again.
identify.plantNotIdentified: Plant could not be identified with sufficient confidence. Please try taking clearer photos or different angles.
identify.serviceUnavailable: Plant identification service is currently unavailable. Please check your internet connection and try again.
identify.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
